page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: {ZOE AGED 9 On Sundays I get up, draw the curtains and listen to the birds singing in the trees.Sometimes the sun streams into my windows and it makes me glad I live in the country when I see the fields and birds,trees,and all the things that the countryside has for me to enjoy.Then I make my Mum and Dad a cup of tea.When my Mum and Dad get up,if it is nice I go for a bike ride to my Nan and Grandad's for breakfast.When I have had my breakfast I help my Grandad in the garden.My Grandad grows strawberries and when they are in season I go and pick them.
